body: nit: I think `_mark_dirty` would still be a better name, because it implies that it has a side effect, while `parse_dirty_inputs` would imply that it doesn't.
body_html: nit: I think _mark_dirty would still be a better name, because it implies that it has a side effect, while parse_dirty_inputs would imply that it doesn't.
body_text: nit: I think _mark_dirty would still be a better name, because it implies that it has a side effect, while parse_dirty_inputs would imply that it doesn't.
